Sure, here are a few proposal ideas for Project Catalyst by Cardano that could be submitted by a community member from Ghana:

1. Building a Cardano-based remittance system: This proposal would aim to create a decentralized remittance system for Ghanaians living abroad to easily and securely send money back to their families and loved ones in Ghana. The system would use the Cardano blockchain to facilitate fast and low-cost transactions, and could also include features such as real-time tracking and mobile integration.
2. Developing a Cardano-based microfinance platform: This proposal would aim to create a decentralized microfinance platform for Ghanaian small businesses and entrepreneurs. The platform would use the Cardano blockchain to facilitate peer-to-peer lending and borrowing, and could also include features such as credit scoring and investment tracking.
3. Educating and building awareness of Cardano in Ghana: This proposal would aim to educate Ghanaians about the benefits and potential of the Cardano blockchain, and to build awareness of the platform in Ghana. The proposal could include activities such as workshops, meetups, and online tutorials, as well as partnerships with local organizations and educational institutions.
4. Building a Cardano-based voting system for Ghana: This proposal would aim to create a decentralized voting system for Ghana that utilizes the Cardano blockchain for secure and transparent voting. The system would be designed to improve voter turnout and participation in Ghanaian elections, as well as to increase the transparency and accountability of the voting process.
5. Developing Cardano-based agricultural supply chain solution: This proposal would aim to create a decentralized agricultural supply chain solution that utilizes the Cardano blockchain to improve transparency, traceability and efficiency of the agricultural supply chain in Ghana. The solution would help farmers and traders to manage their supply chain, improve logistics, and increase revenue.

Please note that these proposals are ideas and you'll need to adjust and research them to make them concrete, specific and feasible proposals that align with the project Catalyst's goal.
